title: Really Nice
review:
Bose is awesome no doubt. Their every product is a masterpiece so let's not discuss how awesome this product is. Let's have cons only 
1). No noise cancellation.
2). Not fully in-ear.
If you use public transport and noises are all around you then it would sometimes feel waste of 13K. At quiet places they are awesome.

title: Great product
review:
It's a great product. It has an awesome sound quality. There has been no compromise on the quality, being a wireless earphones. Few drawbacks I found, which may not be a big issue:
1. These earphones are a little big. You'll face difficulty while wearing it with helmet on while riding a 2 wheeler.
2. Found few disconnections while my phone was in pocket while riding the 2 wheeler. However, if I kept it nearer (inside my jacket pocket), there was no problem.

Also, I found that I was not able to pick WhatsApp calls. Not sure if that issue is from Bose or phone cause my earlier Bose earphone did not have this issue. 

Apart from these, these are awesome earphones. Water resistant and sweat proof. Go for it.

title: Bose built it's masterclass
review: Best in class, with a deep base, and surround sound. Bose delivers it's masterclass with a simple, elegant portable headphone. I would recommend it to any music lover as their daily driver while traveling considering how sleek and light it is. Sound isolation is not a strong suit of the headphone.

title: Worth every penny
review: Bose is bose damn good👍

title: Worth the money
review: The price of the product is just perfect. I am thing of breaking my FD to buy this. The sound is just so heavenly, it transports me to God when I use it. This is the passport to enlightenment. I might even order it as COD to one of my loving enemy friend. Thanks Flipkart.

title: Be careful before the buy
review: First about the headphones, they sound heavenly. Music quality is a Bliss. Never heard such a good bass in any wireless headphones. Tried these out in a Bose store recently. But the product was on Pre-Order on Bose store. I was informed that the earlier release had some sweat issues and would cause failure to headphone on prolonged use. Bose has taken back earlier versions and is releasing revised version solving the sweat issue. So make sure you get the new version instead of the earlier one with issues. It's better to wait off and buy at this moment.

title: Terrific
review:
Finally got my wireless Headphones. 

Aftr all the research on headphones, factors to decide being 
Best, latest and warranty after sales. 

Brand/Models considered 
1. #Bose Soundsport wireless
2. #Jaybird X2
3. #Jaybird Freedom , 
4. #Power Beats 2 Wireless
5. #Sony H.ear in wireless

Decided to go for #Bose. Its best. Good Bass. Reasonable battery backup.

title: Great product
review:
This is my second headphones from Bose and is a great replacement for my previous soundsport wired. 
Sound
It's clear and clean but lacks proper bass and it is not very loud but the maximum volume is distortion free and if you turn up the volume above 70%, it's loud enough and its sound is quite pleasing to the ear. Better than most headphones at this price point but I feel that you should look into beats X and jay birds before making a final decision but nonetheless, you won't regret buying this. It handles sounds of any range amazingly well and feels true to the songs. Highs, mids and lows are perfectly handled by the headphones. I listen to various genres and I have never found anything that this headphone doesn't handle well. 
4/5 
Hardware
The design is great and the wire connecting the earpieces is thick and the wire doesn't tangle at all. The fit is great and it feels comfortable even if you wear it for a long period of time. Since the sound is clear and quite pleasing, you won't get any listening fatigue and because of the fit, you won't feel uncomfortable. Only issue is that the earpieces are quite big and the headphone is easily visible to others. They don't fall off even while running.
4/5
Battery
Decent but in comparison to the likes of Jay Birds and Beats X(which even has a quick charge feature), it is kind of disappointing. I personally can go through around half a day before i need to recharge. Around 6-8 hours.
3/5
Connectivity 
It can connect to two devices at the same time and supports Bluetooth. It also pairs easily and supports NFC. 
5/5
In-Line controls and Mic
You can receive calls and attend to them using the earphones and the sound one either side is pretty clear. The buttons of the inline control are weird but they get the job done.
4/5

title: Best Bluetooth headphone..
review:
I generally dont write reviews but after having searched tirelessly for the best Bluetooth headphone/earphone which are comfortable and sound good , I finally got these. I know the price is ridiculous for a device for just listening to songs but you do get what you pay for. 

The sound quality is very good with balanced punchy bass. Buy it if you think you can afford and you wont be disappointed. 

I have still to see how they hold after using them in workouts. There are a number of reviews where these dont age well. But till now so good.
